nodes.text: Bosco Ng is a storyboard and previsualization artist and television director who has worked on the animated television shows Star Wars: The Clone Wars, Star Wars Rebels and Star Wars Resistance. Bosco Ng was also a storyboard designer for The Venture Bros. series in 2006.

Beginning in 2012, Ng directed several episodes of The Clone Wars. He directed the episode "Friends and Enemies" in season four. In 2015, he directed the Star Wars Rebels television movie Star Wars Rebels: The Siege of Lothal, and episodes such as "Relics of the Old Republic," "Blood Sisters," and "A Princess on Lothal".
